properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 17 at 7:54AM CST until January 19 at 9:20PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At
Gainesville Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Demopolis
Lock and Dam...

.Levels are now beginning to fall along the upper Tombigbee
River...and this trend will spread downstream during the next few
days.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam.
* until Sunday evening...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 7:30 AM Friday the stage was 108.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 101 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by
late Sunday morning.
* Impact...At 109 feet...Flooding of some camps and cabins...as well
as widespread flooding of low-lying woods and agricultural lands...
occurs, especially ustream of the lock and dam. At 101
feet...Flooding of low lying agricultural and wooded lands in the
area occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
